Movies List

Movie ID Title Director
{{movie.id}} {{movie.title}} {{movie.director}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MovieService } from '../../services/movie.service'; import { Observable } from "rxjs"; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movies-list', templateUrl: './movies-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movies-list.component.css'] }) export class MoviesListComponent implements OnInit { // constructor() { } // ngOnInit(): void { // } // var employees=[]; public movies=[]; constructor(private movieService: MovieService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit() { this.reloadData(); } reloadData() { this.movieService.getMoviesList().subscribe(response=> { // console.log(response); this.movies=response; console.log(this.movies); }) } }
